job description:
Advanced Resources Group, Inc. is hiring a Data Analyst II in Plymouth, MN. The Analyst will be responsible for pulling data to support trending of product complaints and medical device reports utilizing data that resides in the complaint handling database for all product lines.

Job Duties:
  • Prepare detailed data reports (e.g. graphs, charts, tables) for routine trending, senior management reviews, ad-hoc requests, and cross-functional requests as needed (e.g. Regulatory, Quality Engineering, R&D)
  • Establish and maintain complex reporting formulas and templates using reporting tools such as Excel and other databases (e.g. Business Objects).
  • Handle multiple projects and timelines effectively and communicate risks and issues to manager regularly.
